* Accelerometer is disabled in laptop mode
** Confirm holding laptop on side does not re-orient screen
** Confirm holding laptop upside down does not re-orient screen

* Accelerometer is enabled in tablet mode
** Confirm holding laptop on side re-orients screen to portrait mode
** Confirm holding laptop on other side re-orients screen to inverted portrait mode
** Confirm holding laptop right side up re-orients screen to landscape mode
** Confirm holding laptop upside down re-orients screen to inverted landscape mode
